GitHub Repository Configuration Summary

Files Created/Updated:
- CODEOWNERS - Automatic PR review assignments
- dependabot.yml - Automated dependency updates
- ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml - Issue template configuration
- workflows/ci.yml - Fixed test paths and PYTHONPATH
- workflows/release.yml - Automated release workflow
- protect-branch.sh - Branch protection script (provides instructions)
- BRANCH_PROTECTION.md - Branch protection setup guide
- description - Repository description

Next Steps:
1. Set up branch protection via GitHub web UI (see BRANCH_PROTECTION.md)
2. Create issue templates manually (bug_report.md, feature_request.md)
3. Create PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md manually
4. Create SECURITY.md manually

All files are ready and properly configured.
